message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $100.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand that $100 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $110 is still a bit higher than I'd like to pay. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $95.
I understand that $95 is still a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my target price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $98.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go below $108. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $108.
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still not willing to pay $108. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $99.
I'm not willing to go below $105. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
I'm not willing to pay $105. I'd like to make a final counteroffer of $100.
